net.proteusframework.core.lang

Class InternationalizedException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • net.proteusframework.core.lang.InternationalizedException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, Notifiable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ValidationException

    @Configurable
public class InternationalizedException
extends java.lang.RuntimeException
implements Notifiable
    Indicates an error with an internationalized message. Can also be used as a Notifiable and transer any sent notifications to another Notifiable.
    Author:
    Russ Tennant (russ@i2rd.com)
    See Also:
    Serialized Form
